Britain was naturally the favourite butt of his individual\nhumour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among the more\nreasonable jibes was telling Ted Heath that Britain's economic crisis was a\ndisgrace to the rest of the Commonwealth. &nbsp; He started the \"Save Britain\nFund\", offering to send cargoes of vegetables to relieve suffering, and\nthat he would organise a whip-round of Uganda's friends, \"if you will let\nme know the exact position of the mess\". &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEE HEEE ! &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was a joke.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nIdi Amin\u2019s son Jaffar first met him ( memory ) he was four and his father\n45.&nbsp;&nbsp; The bewildered boy was ushered into\na stately dining room where, at the end of a large ornate table bedecked with\nfinest British silver cutlery, sat a huge bear of a man wearing a\nmulti-coloured African shirt and American khaki trousers. He did not raise his\nsweat-soaked face from his huge plate of steaming chicken.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Go\non then, taste it,' he commanded the boy in a booming baritone, gesturing to\nhis plate. Jaffar hesitantly raised a forkful to his lips and ate it.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within\nseconds he was clutching at his throat and gasping for breath: the dish was\nsmothered in searingly hot chilli sauce.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His\ntears of shock and pain were mirrored by those streaming down his father's\nface: tears of mirth. Idi was convulsed with laughter. Both hugged each other\nwith tears puring down their cheeks . Jaffar admits, his father had an\n'unusual' sense of humour.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By\nthen Jaffar was being brought up on Nakasero Lodge, another official residence,\nby his father's second wife, Kay.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'In\nAfrica it is normal to have this extended network of family and friends who you\ncan send your children to,' says Jaffar.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'That\nwas when family life really started for me. My father used to love being\nmassaged by his kids so one of us would take each leg and arm and another would\nbe on his back.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'He\nwas a playful and mischievous man and he was always Big Daddy to us.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'He\nloved jesting. One of his favourite jokes was to run at people with a spear.\nThey would be shocked to see this huge figure hurtling at them. Then he would\nthrow the spear so it landed at their feet.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'I\nhated it when people called him a buffoon. I thought of him as like Mohammad\nAli he had that same sense of mischief. He was also a great fan of cartoons; he\nenjoyed slapstick. Tom and Jerry was his favourite.'<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jaffar\nreminisced . 'He would take his wives or girlfriends out in it and\nhead towards a lake,' says Jaffar.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'The\ngirls would start screaming as they thought they were going to drown, but the\ncar just floated. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/india-must-quit-commonwealth-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/india-must-quit-commonwealth-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Africans were not\nexpected to go to the Imperial Hotel (The Grand Imperial Hotel in downtown\nKampala). There was a sign outside the hotel that stayed there until 1952. &nbsp; It\nread: \u201cAfricans and dogs not allowed\u201d. The waiters were mostly Asians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Up till independence in\n1962, there was an unwritten but trusted social order in the colonial\nadministration where Europeans were regarded as first class, brown Indians &nbsp;as second class, and Africans as third class.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In trains there was a\nfirst class coach for Europeans and a few Asians, and there were coaches for\nAsians, and coaches for Africans. Apartheid did not start in South Africa or\nthe US; it started with the \u201cmother country\u201d, Rothschild controlled Great\nBritain ..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was never about\nkicking Indians out. It was more about forcing his own people &nbsp;to get used to money, and to learn to run a\nbusiness. The whole idea was to give a chance to African Ugandans to come up in\nlife instead of working as servants for the Indians and the whites.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were some 85,000\nAsians in Uganda, who usurped more than 92% of commerce and 55% of THE industry.\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost all these\nIndians has British passports . Most were mere Benami fronts for the white\nZionist Jew who did NOT want to live in black smelly Uganda..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amin knew about this\nwhite skin brown skin nexus \u2013he has a good system of intelligence inherited\nfrom Mossad, M16 and KGB.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Idi Amin declared \u201c\nThese Asians with British passports are sabotaging the economy of the country,\nand do not have the welfare of Uganda at heart\".&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How right he was !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rotshchild sent the British\nforeign secretary at the time, James Callaghan, came to plead for the Indians\nwith British Passports .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Idi Amin\nignored him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the Zionist Jew did\nwhat he is best at . He involved deceit to screw Idi Amin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indians&nbsp; were&nbsp;\nimporters, and most of the imported goods they had imported got\nDELIBERATELY stuck in Mombasa, the Kenyan seaport. &nbsp;Nobody claimed the goods and Kenyans got them\nfor peanuts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Idi Amin allowed the\nIndians to take all their &nbsp;possessions .\nOf course it is understood that they could NOT carry their houses, land and unwieldy\nbelongings and black servants &nbsp;with them.\n&nbsp;Idi Amin magnanimously agreed to pay the\nIndians &nbsp;who lost their property, and set\nup a fund at the central bank, the Bank of Uganda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most went &nbsp;to Britain, though limited numbers went to\nCanada and the United States.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'They did not treat the\nindigenous Africans well,' says son of Idi Amin Jaffar. 'This is why my father\neventually expelled Asians who refused to take up Ugandan nationality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Indians who were kicked out were paid\nthrough the Uganda High Commission for the value of their properties and 30% as\ndisturbance allowance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Idi Amin was\nousted from power , the Zionist Jews got their Indian Benami agents back to\nUganda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;President Yoweri Museven returned the\nproperties to their original Indian owners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So our greedy Indians\nmade a CHOOT out of Uganda and &nbsp;repossessed their properties, for which they\nhad already been compensated!!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One significant\nprovision in the independence constitution was an article which stated that\nthose people who were not Ugandans as at Uganda\u2019s independence on 9 October\n1962, had two years to make up their minds, whether to become citizens of the\nnew Uganda or adopt the status of British-protected persons, in which case the\nlatter would have a \u201cBritish passport.\u201d&nbsp;\nAlmost all Indians did NOT opt for Ugandan Passport.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what are they bitching about ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The banks \u2013 Bank of\nBaroda, Bank of India, and Standard Bank of South Africa \u2013 did not lend to many\nAfricans.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As such, the Africans could not participate in wholesale trade\nbecause the colonial government issued wholesale licenses only to traders with\npermanent buildings of stone or concrete. Very few African traders had such\nbuildings.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was clear that the Rothschild wanted native Ugandans to remain\nmenial servants. Idi Amin saw through this nonsense and cried ENOUGH IS ENOUGH &nbsp;!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1932 when the Uganda\nCotton Society tried to obtain high prices by ginning and marketing its own\ncotton and \u201celiminate the BENAMI LEECH Indian middleman,\u201d it was not allowed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Idi Amin did NOT kick\nout Indians overnight. They had 90 days time to arrange logistics and hand over\ntheir business interests to their nominees.&nbsp;\nThe British High Commission was busy those days.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VDGnflF_PkA/VpT-5p0zeBI/AAAAAAABDQs/0P0Tci3UOa0/s1600/912e8TYU92b-914d-48b8-a846-6dc1c9bf22ed.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Idi Amin wanted to\nerode white Zionist Jew hegemony by challenging it and defying it in a variety\nof ways. &nbsp;Being a boxer he had the spirit\nto give severe knocks to white western invincibility \u2013a sustained &nbsp;sustained strategy of irreverence. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As part of his \"economic war\", Idi\nAmin broke diplomatic ties with the UK and nationalised more than a hundred\nhuge Zionist jew &nbsp;British-owned\nbusinesses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; He made &nbsp;Swahili a compulsory language lesson &nbsp;in primary schools .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 7 August 1973, Idi\nAmin decreed Swahili was to be Uganda's official language.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today Swahili serves as\na national language of four nations: Tanzania, Kenya, Uganda and the Democratic\nRepublic of the Congo.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From Uganda's\nindependence from Great Britain in 1962 to early 1971, Milton Obote's regime\nhad terrorized, harassed, and tortured people. &nbsp;Obote imprisoned thousands of Ugandans as\npolitical prisoners . Idi Amin freed all of them as soon as he came to power.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obote\npersecuted Indian traders . Idi Amin reversed this as soon as he took over\npower.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Israel wanted to use Idi\nAmin as an agent to de-stabilise Islamic Sudan. That did NOT happen , as Adi\nAmin named his children with Islamic names.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Idi Amin wersted\npower from Obote with Zionist Jew help, there were mass executions of Acholi and\nLangi troops, on the recommendation of Jew Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Amin coup was\nwarmly welcomed by the people of the Buganda kingdom, which Obote had attempted\nto dismantle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amin repudiated Obote's\nnon-aligned foreign policy, and his government was quickly recognized by\nIsrael, Britain, and the United States. By contrast, presidents Julius Nyerere\nof Tanzania, Kenneth Kaunda of Zambia, Jomo Kenyatta of Kenya, and the\nOrganization of African Unity (OAU) initially refused to accept the legitimacy\nof the new military government.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nyerere, in particular, opposed Amin's regime,\nand he offered hospitality to the exiled Obote, facilitating his attempts to\nraise a force and return to power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as Idi Amin\nconsolidated his power , in 1972, he reversed foreign policy and expelled all\nRothschild agents masquerading as Israeli advisers, &nbsp;and became anti-Israel. For this he would pay\nthe price.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Idi Amin treated his\narmy well. He would often quote an old African proverb, and guffaw &nbsp;\"A dog with a bone in its mouth can't\nbite.\". &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;He used his army to\npunish coffee smugglers . &nbsp;&nbsp;Ousted Obote\nwith &nbsp;Tanzanian Julius Nyerere's and\nIsraeli aid were constantly trying to assassinate idi Amin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Construction work began\non Kibuli Hill, the site of Kampala's most prominent and HUGE mosque. Many\nUgandan Muslims with a sense of history believed that the Muslim defeat by\nChristians in 1889 was finally being redressed. This mosque construction upset\nthe white Christians and the Jews.&nbsp; Idi &nbsp;Amin viewed the churches as potential centres\nof subversion and opposition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In September 1978, Amin\nbanned nearly all Christian Church activities for their subversiveness \u2013\nmanipulated by white Christians and Jews .&nbsp;&nbsp;\nGeneral Mustafa Adrisi was bribed to mutiny. Tanzanian President Nyerere\naided in all these endless pin pricks.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally the Zionist Jews used Tanzanian\narmy to bring down Idi Amin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today almost all\nAfricans are clear about one thing. He\nwould provide free and fair elections and then return the army to barracks. He\ntook to the streets and countryside, stopping looting\u2014being the ex-boxer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upon reflection,\nhowever, Amin added that it would be at least five years before the population were\nready for free elections. &nbsp;He knew the foul\ngames Zionist Jews were laying using Obote and the Tanzanian leadership. He promptly abolished\nParliament and announced he would rule by decree.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1977, an Air France\nflight carrying 300 passengers from Tel Aviv to Paris was hijacked by Palestinian\nterrorists.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT WAS A FLASE FLAG ATTACK AND A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC ( BY ZIONIST\nJEWS ) &nbsp;TO SHOW THAT IDI AMIN WAS\nSPONSORING ISLAMIC TERRORISTS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Idi Amin was taken by\nsurprise .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hijackers released all non-Jewish passengers were released, and\nthe remaining Jewish hostages taken to the airport terminal.
