font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Varahamihira the great\nAstrologer and astronomer from wrote 4600 years ago,&nbsp; in the opening of his Samhita, \u201c It has been\nsaid in Vedas that the first primeval thing was darkness, which is not\nidentical with the black colour, but a kind of non-existence like the state of\na sleeping person.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The big bang is merely\na prelude to the big crunch, and the universe is caught in an infinite cycle of\nexpansion and contraction, symbolizing the primordial black-hole like state is\nAditi, the mother of all mothers and the mother of the cosmos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness of time\ncan be likened to a deep hypnosis which causes one to be in sympathy with the\nvarious frequencies and pulses of the physical universe Our human brain is in\nreality none other than a biological space-time energy transducer.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As such, it\ncreates not only space, but also time. When scalar beams charge through\nhyperspace the flow of time gets redirected temporarily.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Heisenberg's\nuncertainty principle, is&nbsp; another&nbsp; equation of Maya. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/xE4RjallJ8k/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/xE4RjallJ8k?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The position and momentum of a particle cannot\nbe simultaneously measured with arbitrarily high precision. There is a minimum\nfor the product of the uncertainties of these two measurements.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is\nlikewise a minimum for the product of the uncertainties of the energy and time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ql1UN6hcymI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ql1UN6hcymI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">In 1929 Heisenberg visited India to learn about Turiya and Samadhi .</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">We must assume that behind the world of phenomena exists a Superior Mind. This Mind is the Creator of the Universe\"--- <b>Max Plank</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Quantum Physics does NOT give us a clear vision of what we call the classical cause and effect truth.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">&nbsp;As per Vedas Gravity is more than simple attraction. &nbsp;It is orientation. &nbsp;Atomic clocks placed at orbital heights recorded time passing just slightly faster than those at sea level\u2014just because &nbsp;gravity is weaker higher up. &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">The atomic clock installed at US NIST in 1999 , which measures light emitted by supercooled Caesium atoms as they fall though a microwave cavity, can run for 20 million years without losing or gaining a second</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Where gravity, and hence a curvature of space, was greatest time moved more slowly; where it was not, more quickly. &nbsp;The passage of time as we record and experience it here was actually slower than in space.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">TIME DILATION FOR WHICH JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN BECAME FAMOUS IS TOTALLY LIFTED FROM VEDANTA</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Time seems influenced by the physical as well: &nbsp;at a higher altitude actually record time passing faster, where gravity and magnetism are weaker. Gravity can even affect the travel of light. &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Black holes exist in space, where gravity is so strong the light cannot escape, where not even time can be registered for the clock would stop, where everything vanishes.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Gravity can be reduced, nullified and inverted by means of electromagnetic radiation.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Dark matter is a constant sea of matter traveling the opposite direction in the timeline, only appearing for a moment, seeming to travel beyond light-speed, but still exerting gravity.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Gravity is the result of an amount of matter pulling itself together, to create compressive force toward the center, which curves all energy paths both directions in the 4th dimension&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">The closer to center-of-gravity, the faster energy moves, hence the inward pull of gravity. &nbsp;The gravity \u201cfield\u201d is the area where spacetime tries to even itself out. &nbsp;Gravity is a push, NOT a pull.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The electrons, protons and neutrons are only a small part of the\natom.&nbsp; It is the space between them that\nis, ironically, the \u201csubstance.\u201d.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_35TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_35TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_37b+seedBYGoDD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_35B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2039925041832993843\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_35M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/banyan-tree-and-singularity-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1452346762600#c2039925041832993843\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">January 9, 2016 at 7:09 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_35MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi sd,<br />\n<br />\nsri-bhagavan uvaca--<br />\n<br />\nurdhva-mulam adhah-sakham<br />\nashvattham prahur avyayam<br />\nchandamsi yasya parnani<br />\nyas tam veda sa veda-vit<br />\n<br />\nTranslation: The Blessed Lord said, \u201cThere is a banyan tree which has its roots upward and its branches down and whose leaves are the Vedic hymns. One who knows this tree is the knower of the Vedas.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe tree of cosmic existence has no beginning and no end, n\u0101nto na c\u0101dih, in space or in time; for it is eternal and imperishable, avyaya. The hymns of the Veda are compared to its leaves and the man who knows this tree of the cosmos is the Veda-knower.<br />\n<br />\nLord Krishna tells Arjuna in the Kuruskhetra field , just before the war 6000 years ago-<br />\n<br />\n\" This world is a Banyan tree whose roots are above and branches below, and whose attractive leaves are promises of enjoyment. He who knows this tree well knows the methods of gaining such enjoyment. Watered by the three qualities of nature, its branches expand in all directions, upwards and downwards, finally producing buds of enjoyable sense objects. From these branches, roots also fall downwards and find nourishment in the selfish deeds of the mortal world\"<br />\n<br />\nYou must search out what is beyond it; some place from which no one ever strays. There, finally, seek for that Original Person \u2013 the ancient one from whom the true tree grows \u2013 and give yourself to him.<br />\n<br />\nThe upside-down tree is the banyan tree, representing the material world, which is a perverted reflection of the spiritual world. The demigods are on the top branches, the human beings are on the middle branches, and the animals are on the lower branches. A man disentangles himself from the tree by cutting it with the WEAPON OF DETACHMENT.<br />\n<br />\nThe entanglement of this material world is compared here to a banyan tree. For one who is engaged in fruitive activities, there is no end to the banyan tree. He wanders from one branch to another, to another, to another. The tree of this material world has no end, and for one who is attached to this tree, there is no possibility of liberation. The Vedic hymns, meant for elevating oneself, are called the leaves of this tree. This tree's roots grow upward because they begin from where Brahma is located, the topmost planet of this universe. If one can understand this indestructible tree of MAYA (illusion) , then one can get out of it.<br />\n<br />\nThe banyan tree can be found beside a reservoir of temple pond water. We can see that the trees on the bank reflect upon the water with their branches down and roots up. The tree of this material world is only a reflection of the real tree of the spiritual world. This reflection of the spiritual world is situated on desire, just as a tree's reflection is on water. Desire is the cause of things being situated in this reflected material light. One who wants to get out of this material existence must know this tree thoroughly through study of the Vedas . Then he can cut off his relationship with it.<br />\n<br />\nA reflection is temporary, for it is sometimes seen and sometimes not seen. But the origin from whence the reflection is reflected is eternal. The material reflection of the real tree has to be cut off.<br />\n<br />\nWhen it is said that a person knows the Vedas, it is assumed that he knows how to cut off attachment to this material world. If one knows that process, he actually knows the Vedas.<br />\n<br />\nOne who is attracted by the ritualistic formulas of the Vedas is attracted by the beautiful green leaves of the tree. He does not exactly know the true purpose of the Vedas.<br />\n<br />\nThe purpose of the Vedas, as disclosed by the Personality of Godhead Himself, is to CUT DOWN THE REFLECTED TREE and attain the real tree of the spiritual world.<br />\n<br />\nTO UNDERSTAND THIS PROFOUND TRUTH, EVERY TEMPLE HAS A WATER BODY WITH A BANYAN TREE REFLECTED IN THE WATER.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_35MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_35BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_35B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_36B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4425918688286105749\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_36M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/banyan-tree-and-singularity-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1452346792892#c4425918688286105749\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">January 9, 2016 at 7:09 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_36MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nLord Krishna tells Arjuna --<br />\n<br />\n\"The branches of this tree extend downward and upward, nourished by the three modes of material nature. The twigs are the objects of the senses. This tree also has roots going down, and these are bound to the fruitive actions of human society.\"<br />\nBhagavad-gita 15:2<br />\n<br />\nThe real root is from Brahmaloka, and the other roots are in the human planetary systems. After one enjoys the results of virtuous activities in the upper planetary systems ( one of the lower 6 dimensions ) , he comes down to this earth to lighten his KARMIC BAGGAGE , in the hope of attaining the topmost 7th dimension for MOKSHA.<br />\n<br />\n\"The real form of this tree cannot be perceived in this world. No one can understand where it ends, where it begins, or where its foundation is. But with determination one must cut down this tree with the weapon of detachment. So doing, one must seek that place from which, having once gone, one never returns, and there surrender to that Supreme Personality of Godhead from whom everything has began and in whom everything is abiding since time immemorial.<br />\n<br />\naham sarvasya prabhavah, \"I am the origin of everything.\"<br />\n<br />\nTo get out of the entanglement of this strong banyan tree of material life, one must surrender to Krishna. As soon as one surrenders unto Krishna, he becomes detached automatically from this material extension.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/banyan-tree-and-singularity-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nLIKE I SAID BEFORE-<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA CANNOT BE DISCERNED BY MERE SANSKRIT LANGUAGE KNOWING WHITE SKINNED INDOPHILES.<br />\n<br />\nALL THIS IS BEYOND THEIR PETTY MINDS .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE REASON, 4000 YEARS AFTER ADI SHANKARACHARYA IT TAKES A CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO DECLARE \" THERE IS NO HEAVEN OF HELL IN HINDIUSM \"<br />\n<br />\nNOW THE FAKE GURUS HAVE ALREADY LIFTED , REPACKAGED, BACKDATED -AND ARE MAKING MOOLAH BY WRITING THIS ESSENTIAL TRUTH ABOUT KARMA, MOKSHA, HEAVEN AND HELL.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_37b+seedBYGoDD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_37b+seedBYGoDD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Quantum physics takes a\nspiritual perspective in which there are no separate parts, in which everything\nis fluid and always changing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After stupid Newton and\nparty divorced spirit and classical science this planet&nbsp; is faced now with the question of how to\npromote the ascension of consciousness to higher levels of existence amongst\nthe entire world population.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With quantum physics, science is leaving behind\nthe notion that human beings are powerless victims and moving toward an\nunderstanding that we are fully empowered creators of our lives and of our\nworld.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With Newton, we were\ninsignificant cogs in the Universal Machinery. With quantum physics, we are\nCreators of the Universe. Yin is formlessness; yang is form. Each contains the\nseed of the other. Yin and yang are conscious of each other, they are\nconsciousness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness and existence each have a dual yin-yang structure\nin which form and formlessness alternate. . The brain does not create\nconsciousness, but consciousness created the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you do Pranayama\nand are conscious of your breath you are absolutely PRESENT. You cannot think\nand be aware of your breathing. Conscious breathing stops the mind. But far\nfrom being in&nbsp; a trance or half asleep you\nare fully awake and highly alert. You are not falling below thinking, you are\nrising above it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fields of conscousness\nare called M fields \u2013morpogenetic. Just like electromagnetic and gravitational\nfields.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/wms9x1kW858/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/wms9x1kW858?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The plants register emotions like apprehension,\nfear, pleasure and relief when subjected to a polygraph test. Plants exhibit (\nunlike inorganic rocks ) the ability to adapt. A cutting from certain plants\nwill adapt and find new root cells. The greater the ability to adapt, the\nhigher the consciousness within a form.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We see incredible order\nand harmony and pattern which no accident can produce.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This universe is NOT a\nclockwork as contended by IDIOT Newton. Newtons classical physics holds good\nonly for what that can be sensed by the 5 human senses, like the rotten apple\nfalling on his head,&nbsp; NOT the sub-atomic\nworld. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If Newton has seen a TV\nremote control or as Samsung S6 mobile phone , he would have been mentally\nzapped.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DNA is a transceiver of\ninformation, some from the space time dimension and the other form the quantum\nworld.</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bible says\nthat the universe is only thousands of years old (4004 BC if you pleaJJe ) .\nWhile Vedanta and the modern quantum theory agrees that it is around 15 billion\nyears.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can bypass great distances by using your consciousness via worm holes. Considering that\nall physical matter is constructed of quantum points of possibility, we are\nenergy waves not particles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We live in a time\nobstructed world using 5 senses -- and also a timeless realm in the quantum\ndimension, where what you see is NOT what you get..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum rules and\nVedanta does not care for Newton\u2019s third law, which states that every action\nhas an equal and opposite reaction.&nbsp;\nQuantum rules dictate that every action has a multitude of reaction\npossibilities.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain receives info about its\nsurroundings in space. In quantum physics an electron is a point particle,\nbecause it occupies no space, and is thus a imaginary mathematical point.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If all the atoms in the\nworld stopped moving, the world would disappear. .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every human is a\nquantum matrix\u2014a myriad of interlacing processes in constant flux. In nature\nthere is nothing like a circle, it can only be a vortex spiral with ever\nchanging evolution\u2014nothing can remain same for ever and till ad-infinitum.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At zero degrees kelvin\nor minus 273 degree centigrade, at the lowest possible temperature of the\nuniverse, all atoms are supposed to come to a standstill, which means NIL\nenergy as per Newtons physics. But in reality there existed a seething cauldron\nof energy, which is called zero point energy by quantum physicists.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The space between the\nelectrons , which gave free energy to the perpetual motion of the electrons ,\nwhich prevent them from falling into the nucleus, is called Akasha or Ether or\nZero point field.&nbsp; The ancient Vedic\nsages on the banks of the river Saraswati did NOT need to do Mathematical\ncalculations on paper--they could do it 1000 times faster in their great fractal\nminds .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This background ZPE is\nused to explain the unpredictable behavior of sub atomic particles. Virtual\nphotons jump randomly back and forth from the quantum screen between the zero\npoint field and our physical world. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the free energy\nexchange that takes place between the ZPF and the material world.These virtual\nmystical particles are not stable and wink in and our in 1/million of a second.\nIn a pitch dark room where there is NIL light from the outside world , such\nvirtual photons can be measured.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The quantum world thus\ntranscends time and space. Virtual particles have free access anywhere ,\neverywhere , everywhen. Since our world is 4 dimensional, the quantum points\ncan arrange themselves in anyway. They get instructions from the transceiver\ncalled DNA. A male and female contributes \u00bd of the DNA to produce a new born.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness creates\nour space time. By adding the dimension of time to 3D space, our\nconsciousness is given the ability to evolve. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without change there is\nNO evolution, hence the vortex spiral.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In quantum physics it\nis meaningless to think of a particle having a trajectory through space. For in\nthe quantum world all things are possible. It is the same in this space time\nworld till choices are made. Most of these choices are automatic, as they are\nmade necessary by the past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, matter is not condensed\nsubstance but a diffused form of energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Newton\u2019s classical law\nof Inertia states that F=MA ( the basis of the first world war ) M=mass A=\nacceleration. Scalar waves\nare faster than light with no loss of energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nikola Tesla was the\nfirst to discover the longitudinal Scalar wave, after he was guided by\nVivekananda. He used the Tesla induction coil to create scalar waves.\nElectromagnetic waves lose energy at a rate of square of the distance from the\nsource.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A vector quantity has\nboth magnitude and direction while a scalar quantity has only magnitude. Scalar\nwaves react directly with the atomic nucleus, rather than with the orbital\nelectrons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scalar electromagnetics\nis a unified field theory, of electromagnetics and gravitation, as per the Sri\nYantra divine geometry. He was the son of Maharishi\nDevaratha and Sunanda Devi .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once Vaishampayana (\ndisciple of Veda Vyasa ) neglected to attend a critical meeting was slapped\nwith a sanction called Brahmahathi (sin equivalent to killing a Brahmin)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To get rid of this\nBrahmahathi dosham , Vaishampayana had to do some religious ceremonies. He\nwanted his disciples to bear this burden . The proud Yagna Valkya told his\nguru, that he himself can do the needful easily , and hence why involve his\ndisciples ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaishampayana got very\nangry at these words . To add insult to injury Yagnavalkya offered to do the\nperform the penalty all by himself and he could spare all the pupils and the\nguru from dissolving the dosha burden. This made the guru even more angry as\nthis he construed as supreme arrogance and a posture unbecoming of a disciple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaisampayana ordered\nYajnavalkya to give back all the Vedic learning and wisdom that he acquired\nfrom him dismissed him from his gurukul.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">leave his school\nimmediately. Yajnavalkya followed the orders of the professor and discarded all\nthe learning, which immediately evaporated into the solar dimension. And he\nbecame poorer in his knowledge and hence in powers and luster.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yajnavalkya\nfollowed the orders of the maharishi and mentally discarded all the learning,\nwhich immediately evaporated into the akasha And he immediately became poorer\nin his knowledge and hence in powers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The guru could see his\npupils aura shrink instantly as he absorbed all the aura into his own . So our\nman Yajnavalkya underwent this process at midday and became ignorant\u2014 USKA\nBAARAH BAJ GAYA !.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He prayed to Goddess\nSaraswathi .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yajnavalkya approached\nthe Sun God and implored him to teach him more than what he lost and more than\nwhat a human like his Guru knew.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sun God agreed to\nteach and asked him to follow him in the form a horse during his continuous\ntravel across the skies and learn. Yagna Valkya had to face the sun god\u2019s\nchariot and traverse in reverse with the same speed . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus Yajnavlakya became\na Vajasaneya, one who learned as a horse and a branch formed called Vajasaneya\nsakha. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Yajurveda learned\nby Yajnavlkya as a horse from the Sun God is called SuklaYajurveda and the\nearlier one that was learned from Vaismpayana was Krishna Yajurveda. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have injected\npoison in many ways -- when Yajnavalkya vomited out his knowledge , other\ndisciples ate the vomit like absorbed it like Tittiri birds and hence the\nbranch that came from those disciples is called Tittiriya sakha. . The white\nhistorian wrote that Adi shankaracharya ( actually born 4000 years ago\u2014but\nkicked forward in time by 2800 years ) followed the Taittiriya Shakha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL BULL..ALL FIRST\nCLASS WHITE LIES - - -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Yajurveda has been\nsplit into white and black and the shattered into splinters again \u2013 and\ndifferent parts of India follow different systems\u2014all part of a GRAND DIVIDE\nAND RULE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example the Krishna\n( black ) Yajurveda has many parts followed by various parts of India. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vajasaneyi Samhita\n( Shulka Yajurveda \u2013white ) has forty chapters or adhyayas, containing the\nformulas used with the following rituals:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1.-2.: New and Full\nMoon sacrifices<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">22.-25.: Ashvamedha (\npoison injected with queens having sex with a dead horse\u2019s phallus ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">40.: the final adhyaya\nis the famous Isha Upanishad.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The Vedic rituals of the\nRanganathaswamy Temple at Srirangam, the second biggest temple in India, are\nperformed according to the Kanva shakha ( Shulka ) . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Madyandina Saha was\nused by the north India fake mutts while Kanva Sakha is used in South India\u2019s\nFAKE mutts. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader\nintroduces difference in TIME. The Shukla Yajurvedis are classified into two\ngroups called the Madhyandins and the Kanavas. These IDIOTS perform Sandhya\nVandana at noon. Well, I am getting cynical and this is NO good.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Generally the Krishna\nYajurveda includes the Brahmana prose discussions mixed within the Samhita,\nwhile the Shukla Yajurveda has separately a Brahmana text, the Shatapatha\nBrahmana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shukla Yajurveda is\nalso known as Vajasaneya Yajurveda, because it was evolved in great rapidity by\nSun who was in the form of a horse through his manes .The rhythm of recital of\nthese vedas is set to the rhythm of the horse gallop . In Sanskrit, term\n\"Vaji\" means horse. Yajnavalkya divided s Vajasaneya Yajurveda again\ninto fifteen branches, each branch comprising hundreds of Yajus Mantras. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the\nMahabhasya of Patanjali, there were 21 shakhas of Rigveda, 9 of Atharvaveda,\n101 of Yajurveda , and 1000 varieties of chanting of Samaveda. Only 20 or so\nShakhas of the Vedas are extant now, we do possess names of most of the lost\nShakhas of the Rigveda, Yajurveda and Atharvaveda. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fragments of many of\nthe lost shakhas are also available as quotations in ancient works. For the\nSamaveda, we do not have more than 40 names extant. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was 45 years\nbefore a hologram was invented.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our brain can store\nunlimited data, because our brain is holographic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Holograms are all about\nchanging the angle at which two lasers strike a piece of photographic film- to\nrecord many different images on same surface.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any image thus recorded\ncan be retrieved simply by illuminating the film with a laser beam possessing\nthe same angle as the original two beams.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our FREE CHOICE is\nabout finding the right angle to call up the image / memory of what we want or\nsearch. This is why a person seconds away from suicide can be given a tight\nslap across his face , to force change this angle-- and then he would not want\nto commit suicide at all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All spacetime events\nare conscious: they are conscious of other space time events<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are made of\nstardust. Exploding stars are the only way that carbon enters the universe, and\nour bodies are composed of carbon<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A LOT OF HINDUS THOUGHT\nASTROLOGY IS NONSENSE TILL THEY STARTED READING MY BLOGS.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY CHANGED THEIR MINDS WHEN THE FOUND THAT\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL CONSULTED ASTROLOGERS FOR HIS ELDER SONs MARRIAGE.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY ONLY KNOW THAT THE MAN WHO RUNS THIS\nBLOGSITE IS NOT A HALF WIT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Rig Veda\nthe knowledge of the \"soul,\" or the Self of all beings is the\nprerequisite to the understanding of anything else. The Upanishads say:\n\"Know that, by which everything is known\u201d.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once we have a glimpse of the\nomnipresent nature of our consciousness, once we have a glimpse of a field of\nexistence that is indeed the omnipresent source of all that exists, we\nnaturally start to be aware of the interconnectedness of all levels of\ncreation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once we have seen the whole, we start to recognize the parts as\nexpressions of the whole. Since the whole is holistic in its nature, its\nexpressions are holistic representations of the whole.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chidananda Rupa\nShivoham Shivoham<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I am not the mind,\nintellect, ego, or memory.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I am not the eyes,\nears, nose, tongue or skin.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I am not the earth,\nwind, fire, water or ether.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Indeed, I am\nconsciousness-bliss, I am Shiva.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Na Vak Pani Padau Na\nChopastha Payu<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I am not prana, the\nfive types of breath, <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">the seven material\nessences, nor the five coverings.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I am not the rectum,\ngenitals, legs, hands or mouth. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Indeed, I am\nconsciousness-bliss, I am Shiva.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Na Me Dvesha Ragau Na\nMe Lobha Mohau<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Mado Naiva Me Naiva\nMatsarya Bhavah<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Na Dharmo Na Chartho Na\nKamo Na Mokshah<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Chidananda Rupa\nShivoham Shivoham<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I have no hatred or\ndislike, no affiliation or liking, no greed or delusion, no pride or\nhaughtiness, no feelings of envy or jealousy. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I have no duty\n(dharma), no wealth, no desire (kama), nor liberation (moksha). <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Indeed, I am\nconsciousness-bliss, I am Shiva.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Na Punyam Na Papam Na\nSaukhyam Na Dukham<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Aham Bhojanam Naiva\nBhojyam Na Bhokta<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Chidananda Rupa\nShivoham Shivoham<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I have neither merit,\nnor demerit. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I do not commit deeds,\nbad or good,<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I am neither happy nor\nsad, I experience neither pain nor pleasure. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I do not need mantras,\nholy places, scriptures, rituals or sacrifices.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I am not the seer nor\nthe seen, the experience or the experiencer. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Indeed, I am\nconsciousness-bliss, I am Shiva.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Na Me Mrityu Shanka Na\nMe Jati Bhedah<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Pita Naiva Me Naiva\nMata Na Janma<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Na Bandhur Na Mitram\nGurur Naiva Shishyah<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Chidananda Rupa\nShivoham Shivoham</i><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I have no fear of\ndeath, I am deathless.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I have no separation of\nSelf, no doubt of my existence, nor caste discrimination.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I have no father or\nmother, as I was never born. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I am no one's relative,\nfriend, guru, or disciple. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Indeed, I am\nconsciousness-bliss, I am Shiva.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Aham Nirvikalpo\nNirakara Roopaha<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Vibhur Vyapya Sarvatra\nSarvendriyanam<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Sada Me Samatvam Na\nMuktir Na Bandhah<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Chidananda Rupa\nShivoham <o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>...</i><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I am all-pervasive. I have\nno attributes, I am formless. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I have no world\nattachment, nor am I liberated.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I have no wish for\nanything as I am everything,&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">everywhere, always,&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">always in equilibrium.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Indeed, I am\nconsciousness-bliss,&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; on Ashtavakra Gita. I could not reply to that(link failed) hence posting a new comment just to point out a few things in this regard.<br />\n<br />\nYou said: [There are no other statements anywhere in Ashtavakra Gita brimming with transcendental wisdom like the Bhagawad Gita coming out of a superior being of DNA exceeding 13 strands -- beyond time and space.]<br />\n<br />\nYou are correct, but that is how it is supposed to be!<br />\n<br />\nAshtavakra Gita is not a text book meant for gaining some kind of wisdom, transcendental or otherwise. There is nothing in Ashtavakra Gita which you need to intellectually understand and remember. You just read it, and in the reading the walls of ignorance should shatter. With consistent and pin pointed hammering, it brings your attention back to your Real Nature again and again and again. And at some stage, something might click in. Then the self reference goes for a toss.<br />\n<br />\nSo my point is, Bhagwad Gita is like the medical text. Where as Ashtavakra Gita is a pill. Reading Ashtavakra Gita is equivalent to doing 'Atma Vichara' (Self Enquiry).<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nYou said: [This is why nobody will ever talk about a mundane Ashtavakra's Gita, which offers a common man NO solace]<br />\n<br />\nYou are correct, but that is how it is supposed to be!<br />\n<br />\nAshtavakra Gita does not offer any solace for any of your problems. It just tries to wake you up to know that there was no problem, ever.<br />\nOnce awake, do you want any solace from last night's nightmare?<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nYou said: [Ashtavakra Gita is like a POTTED PLANT --no room for expansion\u2014while bhagawad Gita is VAST LIKE THE COSMOS which has space for you , and offers you immense solace.]<br />\n<br />\nYou are correct, but it doesn't matter!<br />\n<br />\nThere is no need to expand or explore. When you are one step away from the tip of the summit, all you need is \"one step\". This is why it was said that Ashtavakra Gita is not meant for public at large.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nYou said: [These are suitable for the western mind\u2014NOT the Indian mind.]<br />\n<br />\nThese are suitable for any mind which has understood the futility of mind in realizing the Truth and thoroughly felt the helplessness thus ready to surrender.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nYou said: [The difference between Bhagwad Gita and a single holy book of newly sprouted religions( Ashtavakra Gita ) included\u2014 is that these single holy books do NOT allow you to add or take anything from it, like modern zionist multinational company manuals.]<br />\n<br />\nAgain, Ashtavakra Gita is a direct and precise pointer to Truth. There is no need to add or take out from that. Just turn your attention towards what it points to.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nYou said: [This is the difference between a book uttered by a Vishnu avatar and a book uttered by a mortal]<br />\n<br />\nAbsolutely... But, my guess is that whoever had authored Ashtavakra Gita must have done that while Lord Vishnu is awakened in him/her.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_51BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1452519354772#c3788219913497321333\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">January 11, 2016 at 7:05 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_50MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi mm,<br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE HEARD SCIENTISTS TAKE ABOUT \"ACID\" AND \"ALKALI\" DIFFERENTIATION THIS MINDLESS ASHTAVAKRA GITA WAY !!<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL NOT IMPRESSED BY PEOPLE LIKE TRIPLE SRI WHO GOES AROUND PREACHING ASHTAVAKRA GITA?<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE THEIR MINDS ARE PETTY.<br />\n<br />\nTHEIR SHALLOW MINDS ARE THRILLED BY SUCH IMMATURE , \"STUPID MAN\" VERSUS \"WISE MAN\" COMPARISIONS .<br />\n<br />\nI WILL JUST GIVE JUST THREE VERSES BELOW --<br />\n<br />\nThere is neither heaven nor hell nor even liberation during life. In a nutshell, in the sight of the seer nothing exists at all.\u096518-80\u0965<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD SCREWED HIMSELF WITH ASHTAVAKRA GITA, BY TALKING ABOUT HEAVEN AND HELL IN HINDUSIM.<br />\n<br />\nWHERE IS THE WISDOM INHERENT ?<br />\n<br />\nThere are no states as dreams or sleep or waking. There is no fourth state 'Turiya' beyond these, and no fear for me , who is established in Self.\u096519-5\u0965<br />\n<br />\nThere is no existence or non-existence, no non-duality or duality. What more is there to say? Nothing arises out of me.\u096520-14\u0965<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE READ ALL THE DASA VERSES --<br />\n<br />\nI DO NOT DWELL ON FOOLISH VERSES OF THE ROTHSCHILD CREATED , FAKE WORKS<br />\n<br />\nHINDUISM IS A PROFOUND RELIGION --IT CANNOT BE HIJACKED BY SOME MUNDANE STUFF.<br />\n<br />\n#############<br />\ni once went to a restaurant in mumbai in 1977. a man was eating \"TANDOORI CHICKEN \" by my side .<br />\n<br />\ni told him \" WHAT YOU ARE EATING IS NOT TANDOORI CHICKEN, AS I KNOW THE BONE AND FLESH STRUCTURE \"<br />\n<br />\nhe replied \" NAHI--YEH CHICKEN HI HAI \"<br />\n<br />\nthen i called the man at the counter and asked him if the bird on the plate is chicken .<br />\n<br />\nhe went on the threatening offensive--SAAALA GAANDU PHUUTT IDHAR SE , NAHI TO UKHADKE GHAAD DOONGA type.<br />\n<br />\ni whispered--- in one hour time , i will have this restaurant closed down and you will be in jail for several years .<br />\n<br />\ni had the clout to do this having friends in right places.<br />\n<br />\nimmediately the man apologised and gave a REAL tandoori chicken to the confused guy sitting by my side.<br />\n<br />\nSO-- TO YOU I WILL SAY THIS--<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUE EATING YOUR WELL DESERVED FAALTHU BIRD .<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_51b+seedBi0yVD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_51b+seedBi0yVD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
