margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2yV1S_0nigk/Vo9kkrde6uI/AAAAAAABDGI/k7vC9C4fmuw/s400/ima9ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/shravana-manana-nididhyasana-way-of.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/shravana-manana-nididhyasana-way-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/lord-shiva-as-first-guru-dakshinamurthy.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/lord-shiva-as-first-guru-dakshinamurthy.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0Pn5oo24THM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0Pn5oo24THM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human brain is a holographic\nstorage device. Holograms encode distributed information as multi-scalar\ninterference of coherent vibrations, e.g. from lasers. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How were the ancient\nmaharishis able to record the distances bwteeen planets and their diameters?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why is 108 a divine\nnumber in Sanatana Dharma?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are structures inside\nthe brain neurons called microtubules, which are sources of laser-like\ncoherence for the brain's vibrational hierarchy. Consciousness resides, in the\nmicrotubules of the brain cells, which are the primary sites of quantum\nprocessing.&nbsp; Upon death, this information\nis released from your body, meaning that your consciousness goes with it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/gamma-brain-waves-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/gamma-brain-waves-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per Vedanta&nbsp; we are essentially holographic energy&nbsp; beings existing in a state of resonance with\nthe scalar field of the cosmos. . The brain without consciousness is inert and\nlifeless.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Consciousness is a form of matter just as matter is a form of\nconsciousness. All atoms in the entire universe are capable of mind reading and\ncommunicating with other atoms.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The conscious mind can\nbe engaged 100% in giving bull&nbsp; or deep\nthinking or day dreaming while the subconscious keeps the car safely on the road.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brain is 83% water . If\nthere is NO water in the brain it cannot function or think. Water can store\ninformation about substances that were once in it but that have physically\ndisappeared.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-J6lARqf9eUo/Vo9t-hvZnFI/AAAAAAABDGk/ytvfGUrRUGo/s1600/imapges.jpgukl6yut.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"478\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-J6lARqf9eUo/Vo9t-hvZnFI/AAAAAAABDGk/ytvfGUrRUGo/s640/imapges.jpgukl6yut.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Latest generation\ncomputer robotic research is investigating water's capacity to order and\ntransmit information, as an improvement to silicon. Our brain stores\ninformation in the holographic form. Every cell in our body carries all\ninformation to produce a copy.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water has an unusually\nlarge heat capacity, requiring a lot of energy to increase its\ntemperature.&nbsp; Water absorbs radiation of\nall wavelengths from the cosmos.&nbsp; Human\nvibrational energy, thoughts, words, ideas and music, affect the molecular\nstructure of water.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/A9Xru1ReRwc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/A9Xru1ReRwc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most mysterious and\ncontroversial property of water, is its ability to hold and store memory. This\nis the eason Hindus immerse the cremated bones in water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Italian waitress when\nin power, tried to stop it with help from &nbsp;atheist communists and Joshua Project two.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water registers precise\nmolecular information about the world around it, and that is extremely\nsensitive to these frequencies coming into it.Water remembers, or stores this\ninformation, and that it can transport this into new environments when it\ntravels through various water cycles.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water receives cosmic\nradiation at extreme low frequencies even deep down five kilometres below the\nsea, creating resonances or vibrations that are healing and healthy for nature\nsince the world began.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/MyxCjnHqBq8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/MyxCjnHqBq8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This memory property\nunderlies the healing capability of homeopathy. A homeopathic solution usually\nin water is produced via a series of dilutions of a substance, often until\neffectively no atoms of the original material remain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only an imprint or memory\nremains for the cure, and the greater the dilution, the greater the effectiveness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-f2wF31IVPb4/Vo9upHQVkrI/AAAAAAABDGs/4Y0mk7Ebh-A/s1600/downleeeeoad.jpgBT4BG.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-f2wF31IVPb4/Vo9upHQVkrI/AAAAAAABDGs/4Y0mk7Ebh-A/s400/downleeeeoad.jpgBT4BG.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Experiments showed that\nthe immune system can be triggered using hundred times dilutions of an aqueous\nsolution of an antibody.. If water has a memory then the water we drink is\ntransferring its memory into our \"water body,\" just like a homeopathic\nsolution does.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The conscious and\nsubconscious minds are connected through a filter. So we cant read the contents\nof our subconscious mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subconscious mind never\nsleeps even in a coma&nbsp;&nbsp; Every experience\nwe have ever had is impressed somewhere in the electrochemical cells in our\nbrain. The brain records everything\u2014everything thrown up by our 5 senses\u2014 and\nit is imprinted in the brain cells for ever.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whenever something\nreactivates those cells we get a mental picture duplicating the original experience.&nbsp; Subconscious mind has a memory of more than\n100 trillion images, all our experiences, emotions and feelings are stored as\nan image or a sound in a digitised or rather a holographic manner .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Data that cannot be\nrecalled are retained in the subconscious. A person may be unconscious of ever\nhaving been locked in a closet as a child, yet under hypnosis he may recall the\nexperience vividly.&nbsp; Negative suggestions\nwith growing children gets rooted in their subconscious mind and is reflected\nlater in their behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During hypnosis \u2013our\nconscious mind goes into a trance and suggestions are given directly to the\nsubconscious mind, which cannot argue but accepts the suggestion at its face\nvalue. We do self hypnosis unknowingly several times a day while doing our day\nto day activities. This is how our body learns to relax otherwise we would die\nof stress at a very early age.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain develops and\norganises its function in direct response to the pattern, intensity and nature\nof sensory and perceptual experiences. The brain plays closer attention to\nthings that don't fit an established pattern, things that are new and\ndifferent.&nbsp; The brain reacts to routine\nmundane stimulus by lowering levels of stimulation. That is why mothers singing\nthe same boring lullaby day after day, will quickly lull their infants to\nsleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the brain and\ncentral nervous system that hears. The inner ear cochlea is filled with liquid.\nMicroscopic hairs called cilia project out into this liquid and they release a\nchemical neurotransmitter when stimulated.&nbsp;\nNeurons are brain cells, and you have billions of them in your head and\nspinal cord. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neurons \u201ctalk\u201d to one\nanother electrically through specialized connections called synapses.&nbsp; The axon is the part of the neuron that\ncarries electrical impulses away from the cell body.&nbsp; At the end of the axon, there are specialized\nendings where the electrical signal gets transferred onto the dendrites of\nanother neuron.&nbsp; These are the\nsynapses.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In most neurons, the\naxon is wrapped up in an electrical insulator made of a substance called\nmyelin.&nbsp; Electrical impulses travel\nfaster down axons that are insulated, and so the presence and amount of myelin\non an axon alters the neuron's ability to transmit electrical signals. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost everything that\nhappens in our brains comes down to circuits of neurons transmitting electrical\nsignals.&nbsp; Basically a mechanical signal\nis converted&nbsp; to an electrical signal A\nsound wave is a longitudinal wave-- a series of compressions and rarefactions\n.The wonder of the cilia hairs is that it can perceive 1500 levels of pitch. The\nnumber of discriminable tones in in the hundreds of thousands.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we learn at school\nand college and finally forget everything, you are educated. It is NOT about\nremembering . It is about making neural pathways in the brain \u2013 or for a layman\ndigging new tunnels .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is where our\nIndian education system is found wanting. Education system in school should be\nall about digging new tunnels or connecting more circuits in the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wave-particle duality,\na fundamental concept of quantum mechanics, proposes that elementary particles,\nsuch as photons and electrons, possess the properties of both particles and\nwaves. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta extends this\ntheory &nbsp;to the soul-body dichotomy. &nbsp;&nbsp;If there is a quantum code for all things,\nliving and dead, then there is an existence after death . &nbsp;&nbsp;You are NOT what you see in the mirror \u2013you are\na ball of energy\u2014the soul which was born with the stars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as a particle\n\u201cwrites\u201d all of its information on its wave function, the brain is the tangible\n\u201cfloppy disk\u201d on which we save our data, and this data is then \u201cuploaded\u201d into\nthe spiritual quantum field.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Continuing with this analogy, when we die the\nbody, or the physical disk, is gone, but our consciousness, or the data on the\ncomputer, lives on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body dies but the\nspiritual quantum field continues. In this way, you are immortal.&nbsp; The petty shallow western mind cant fathom\nthis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Information in our\ncentral nervous system is phase encoded, a type of coding that allows multiple\npieces of data to occupy the same time.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spiritual properties correspond exactly\nto the characteristics that distinguish the extremely puzzling and wondrous\nphenomena in the quantum world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Meanwhile some additional questions have arisen which please, answer when you answer my first questions.<br />\n1. What is the meaning of \u201cpeople\u201d in \u201cpeople\u2019s war\u201d? Does it mean war on behalf of India\u2019s millions, or the Negroes in East, South or West Africa, or the Negroes of America, or all of them? Are the Allies engaged in such a war?<br />\n2. Are the finances of the Communist Party, represented by you, subject to public audit? If they are, may I see them?<br />\n3. It is stated that the Communist Party has actively helped the authorities to arrest leaders and organizers of labour strikes during the last two years.<br />\n4. The Communist Party is said to have adopted the policy of infiltrating the Congress organization with a hostile intent.<br />\n5. Is not the policy of the Communist Party dictated from outside?<br />\nYours sincerely,<br />\nM. K. GANDHI\"<br />\nGandhi further wrote \u201d Many honest Congressmen come to me or write to me from the various provinces that communists have no principles save of keeping their party alive and beating their opponents with any stick that came to their hands.\u201d (Letter no 721, Page no 413)<br />\n<br />\nSA Dange had written that th Commies \u201c had decided to establish a network of underground combat cells all over India during the next two years, to be used in case of need\u201d<br />\n<br />\nWE CALL THIS \u201cSLEEPER CELLS \u201c. death.<br />\n<br />\nthe dead bodies of such people who attained MOKSHA ( jivan mukkt while living on earth ) are BURIED.<br />\n<br />\njivan mukht sages like apollonius can do astral travel. their soul leave the body takes a ride and them re-enters the body.<br />\n<br />\nyou are NOT what you see in the mirror.<br />\n<br />\nYOU are a just tiny BALL OF ENERGY within you. this ball ( soul ) can never be destroyed .<br />\n<br />\nwe do namaste to the GREAT soul in the other man<br />\n<br />\nas long as you have accumulated baggage of karma , your soul is parked in one of the bottom 6 astral layers .<br />\n<br />\nyou ( your soul ) is re-inducted back on earth , from any of the bottom 6 astral layers to give you another chance to reduce your karmic baggage -from the bottom 6 layers.<br />\n<br />\nif your karmic baggage is too high, you will take re-birth to suffer.<br />\n<br />\nthe field of brahmAn ( god ) , does not treat all the same.<br />\n<br />\nthis is why some are beautiful having brains who are respected , while some are ugly lepers with NIL brains who are despised .<br />\n<br />\nUNLIKE WHAT FAKE GURUS HAVE BEEN SPREADING-- YOU ( SOUL ) ARE FORGING YOUR HINDUISM.<br />\n<br />\nHINDUS MUST CREMATE THE DEAD BODY--<br />\n<br />\nWHILE THE BODY BURNS , YOUR SKULL POPS AND CREATES A PERSONAL TSUNAMI WAVE ( SOLITION CARRIER WAVE ) AND YOUR SOUL RIDES UP TO ANY OF THE 6 ASTRAL LAYERS .<br />\n<br />\nno other soul trapped on earth can take a piggy back ride .<br />\n<br />\nif your skull does not pop your eldest son must break your skull with a heavy rod to generate that soliton wave while being cremated.<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU ARE BURIED ( LIKE MUSLIMS/ CHRISTIANS/ VEERASHAIVAS ) YOU ( SOUL ) IS TRAPPED ON EARTH FOREVER --TO BE MISERABLE AND LOST.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU DO NOT HAVE EGO, YOU ARE BURIED AFTER DEATH -- LIKE SAGES , AND SMALL CHILDREN OF LESS THAN 27 MONTHS OF AGE.<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA URGES YOU TO SHED YOUR EGO AND LEAD A SIMPLE LIFE WHILE ON EARTH.<br />\n<br />\nYOUR EGO IS YOUR ( SOULs ) GREATEST ENEMY.<br />\n<br />\nEVOLUTION IS YOUR ( SOULs ) EVOLUTION UP THE LADDER -- TO THE 7 LAYERS.<br />\n<br />\nEVOLUTION IS NOT MAD MAN CHARLES DARWINs BULLSHIT THEORY OF MAN TO MONKEY.<br />\n<br />\nCONSCIOUS ANIMALS ELEPHANT, BONOBOS, DOLPHINS etc ARE IN LINE TO BECOME HUMAN AFTER DEATH.<br />\n<br You have known neither paradise nor hell. Here there is no happiness, no punishment, no family, no enemies. Rise in tranquility. Here words end, like thought. This was your last illusion- the veil of MAYA is now lifted .\u201d<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHALLOW MIND OF THE WHITE MAN CANNOT UNDERSTAND WHAT I WROTE ABOVE<br />\n<br />\nThe philosophy of ancient India is quite diverse and complex in structure. So complex, in fact, that almost all have given up on making sense of this kaleidoscope\u2014till Quantum physics came on the scene.<br />\n<br />\nYet since the advent of quantum physics reveals that Vedanta is beyond the cutting edge of physics, which is only now, discovering the illusory nature of physical reality and the existence of subtler energy and information currents behind all that we see.<br />\n<br />\nVedanta is the very science of consciousness at both human and cosmic levels. It recognises consciousness as the ultimate reality and affirms its presence in all existence.<br />\n<br />\nModern physicists have looked to Vedanta for understanding their proposed unitary field of consciousness behind the universe, to explain the coherence of all cosmic laws and understand the THEORY OF EVERYTHING represented by the divine geometry of Sri Yantra ( the geometry of OM)<br />\n<br />\nVedanta is the unitary philosophy explaining the oneness of the individual soul with the universal consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nSuperluminal communication is a hypothetical process in which information is sent at faster-than-light (FTL) speeds. If wormholes are possible, then ordinary subluminal methods of communication could be sent through them to achieve superluminal transmission speeds<br />\n<br />\nOn the surface Quantum Physics (QP) and Vedanta may look very different. One is part of the scientific tradition and the other in some ways is philosophy soaked in spirituality.<br />\n<br />\nScience is trying to understand the universe \u2018out there\u2019 and Vedanta addressed the universe \u2018inside you\u2019\u201d<br />\n<br />\nOne of the fundamental difference between western philosophy, with that,of Vedanta is that ,the western philosophy believe the universe and everything in the universe belongs to god.<br />\n<br />\nOn the other hand Vedanta philosophy believe that god himself present in each and every atom of this creation ,god is present not only in human, but even in animals ,plants , rocks ,stars planets atom and molecules.<br />\n<br />\nTo a Vedantic every part of this universe is dynamic, it is vibrating, it is listening and can respond according to ones KARMA, It can be by action and can be purely thought. The universe listens to our action as well as thought and gives in return what exactly we want either knowingly or unknowingly, weather it is bad or good.<br />\n<br />\nThe scientific tradition is about Science of object. And Vedanta is called science of consciousness or science of subject. And is not a philosophy<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_9BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_6T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_6TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_6TN\"></span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_6B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7603640773661651980\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_6M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_30.html?showComment=1514595060183#c7603640773661651980\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 30, 2017 at 6:21 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_6MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nMundaka Upanishad says: \u201cJust as a spider projects its own web and then re-absorbs it into its own body, so also That One Reality projects this variegated universe and then absorbs it back into it.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nSanatana Dharma views the universe as an inseparable web, whose interconnections are dynamic and not static, the cosmic web is alive; it moves and grows and changes continually.<br />\n<br />\nModern physics, too, has come to conceive of the universe as such a web of relations and, like Vedanta, has recognized that this web is intrinsically dynamic. The dynamic aspect of matter arises in quantum theory as a consequence of the wave-nature of subatomic particles.<br />\n<br />\nTalking about the Quantum Physics we stumbled upon the most bizarre result of quantum theory came when Bell\u2019s theorem and subsequent experiments proved the so called entanglements to be right. In such cases, two or more atoms, electrons or photons demonstrate correlated properties even at distances where no communication is possible between them during the given time.<br />\n<br />\nThese developments are the most important developments in the history of physics and perhaps in the whole of science. They give rise to the idea of the interconnected wholeness of the world and non-local interactions in contrast to the separate identities with local interactions.<br />\n<br />\nThe Kerala school of math used math as a spiritual activity \u2013based on which astrology thrived. They used math as a most subtle and rigorous form of thought.<br />\n<br />\nBoth Pythagoras and Plato studied in the Kerala school of Math at Kodungallur university and they introduced this concept to the west without really understanding the depth<br />\n<br />\nEven today, the modern mind has NOT reached the bottom of the ancient Indian sage\u2019s mind.<br />\n<br />\nThe white historian must know that ENTIRE Greek philosophy was stolen from Indian philosophy written 4500 years earlier.<br />\n<br />\nGreeks never really understood the real essence of profound subjects like Epistemology, though Indian sages taught them in their own lands. Pythagoras ( died 495 BC ) and Plato studied in India. Aristotle lifted from Vedanta material taken out of India<br />\n<br />\nPlato ( died 348 BC ) , a homosexual shared his stolen from Kodungallur University spoils with his mentor Socrates ( died 399 BC ) , and fellow homosexual side kick Aristotle ( died 322 BC ) and got himself immortalized as the founder of the Academy in Athens, the first institution of higher learning in the Western world.<br />\n<br />\nAristotle, Socrates and Plato were hardcore homosexuals . Aristotle initiated Alexander the great into homosexuality.<br />\n<br />\nQuantum Teleportation ( mentioned in Vedas ) has been achieved. Scientists from China recently set the record for the farthest quantum teleportation ever, when they beamed a photon in its quantum state into orbit. This brings several quantum mechanical concepts into the equation, including quantum entanglement.<br />\n<br />\nTeleportation is a verification of Quantum Entanglement<br />\n<br />\nAction at a distance implies that a physical object can be moved by non-physical means, so not by touch or physical force. With entanglement, it means that either information is travelling FAR FAR faster than the speed of light ( VEDAS SAYS IT IS INSTANTANEOUS )<br />\n<br />\nWorldview paradigms are changing, yet old scientific dogma ( THANKS TO THE CUNT POPE ) still sticks around and dominates.<br />\n<br />\nQuantum entanglement\u2014 physics at its strangest \u2014 ( written down in Vedas 7000 years ago ) has moved out of this world and into space.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/quantum-entanglement-video-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nA team of Chinese physicists sent eerily intertwined quantum particles from a satellite to ground stations separated by 1200 kilometers, smashing the previous world record.<br />\n<br />\nThe result is a stepping stone to ultrasecure communication networks and, eventually, a space-based quantum internet.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_6MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_6BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_6B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_7B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2849351715198825203\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_7M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_30.html?showComment=1514595161341#c2849351715198825203\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 30, 2017 at 6:22 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_7MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nEntanglement involves putting objects in the peculiar limbo of quantum superposition, in which an object's quantum properties occupy multiple states at once<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/schrodinger-father-of-quantum-physics.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPhysicists have entangled particles such as electrons and photons, as well as larger objects such as superconducting electric circuits.<br />\n<br />\nTheoretically, even if entangled objects are separated, their precarious quantum states should remain linked until one of them is measured or disturbed. That measurement instantly determines the state of the other object, no matter how far away. The idea is so counterintuitive that IDIOT Albert Einstein mocked it as \"spooky action at a distance.\"<br />\n<br />\nIn 2015, the most sophisticated of these tests, which involved measuring entangled electrons 1.3 kilometers apart, showed once again that spooky action is real.<br />\n<br />\nBeyond the fundamental result, such experiments also point to the possibility of hack-proof communications.<br />\n<br />\nLong strings of entangled photons, shared between distant locations, can be \"quantum keys\" that secure communications. Anyone trying to eavesdrop on a quantum-encrypted message would disrupt the shared key, alerting everyone to a compromised channel.<br />\n<br />\nPSSSSTTT-- BEFORE CHINA INVENTS THE QUANTUM SATELLITE--WE MUST BREAK THE NATION INTO 4 PARTS AND HAVE TIBET AS A NEIGHBOUR<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nEntangled photons degrade rapidly as they pass through the air or optical fibers. So far, the farthest anyone has sent a quantum key is a few hundred kilometers.<br />\n<br />\nOnce you have satellites distributing your quantum signals throughout the globe, you've done it,--You've leapfrogged all the problems you have with losses in fibers.<br />\n<br />\nJian-Wei Pan, a physicist at the University of Science and Technology of China in Shanghai, got the chance to test the idea when the Micius satellite, was launched in August 2016. The satellite is the foundation of the $100 million Quantum Experiments at Space Scale program<br />\n<br />\nBell's theorem is a \"no-go theorem\" that draws an important distinction between quantum mechanics (QM) and the world as described by classical mechanics<br />\n<br />\nIn its simplest form, Bell's theorem states: No physical theory of local hidden variables can ever reproduce all of the predictions of quantum mechanics.<br />\n<br />\nBell's theorem is the most profound discovery of science.and it is lifted straight out of the Vedas<br />\n<br />\nThere is no need for a faster-than-light signal to tell particle A what measurement has been carried out on particle B, because the universe, including particle A, already 'knows' what that measurement, and its outcome, will be.<br />\n<br />\nLOT OF MY DETRACTORS WERE GUFFAWING LIKE DONKEY WHO HAVE SEEN FRESH SHIT WHEN THEY HEARD THAT MY WIFE MATCHED MORE THAN 500 HOROSCOPES FOR MY ELDER SONs BRIDE<br />\n<br />\nBell\u2019s theorem and subsequent experiments proved the so called entanglements to be right. In such cases, two or more atoms, electrons or photons demonstrate correlated properties even at distances where no communication is possible between them during the given time.<br />\n<br />\nThese developments are the most important developments in the history of physics and the whole of science. They agree with Vedanta. They give rise to the idea of the interconnected wholeness of the world and non-local interactions in contrast to the separate identities with local interactions.<br />\n<br />\nIn their first experiment, the Chinese team sent a laser beam into a light-altering crystal on the satellite. The crystal emitted pairs of photons entangled so that their polarization states would be opposite when one was measured.<br />\n<br />\nThe pairs were split, with photons sent to separate receiving stations in Delingha and Lijiang, 1200 kilometers apart. Both stations are in the mountains of Tibet, reducing the amount of air the fragile photons had to traverse., the team reports simultaneously measuring more than 1000 photon pairs.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_7MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_7BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_7B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_8B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5265314992318285551\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_8M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_30.html?showComment=1514595226017#c5265314992318285551\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 30, 2017 at 6:23 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_8MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<br />\n<br />\nThey found the photons had opposite polarizations far more often than would be expected by chance, thus confirming spooky action over a record distance<br />\n<br />\nThe team had to overcome many hurdles, including keeping the beams of photons focused on the ground stations as the satellite hurtled through space at nearly 8 kilometers per second.<br />\n<br />\nPan baby's team recovered only about one photon out of every 6 million sent from the satellite\u2014far better than ground-based experiments but still far too few for practical quantum communication.<br />\n<br />\nPan expects China's National Space Science Center to launch additional satellites with stronger and cleaner beams that could be detected even when the sun is shining. (Micius operates only at night.)<br />\n<br />\nIn the next 5 years we plan to launch some really practical quantum satellites, Pan baby says \u2013and I believe him<br />\n<br />\nIn the meantime, Pan baby plans to use Micius to distribute quantum keys to Chinese ground stations, which will require longer strings of photons and additional steps.<br />\n<br />\nThen he wants to demonstrate intercontinental quantum key distribution between stations in China and Austria, which will require holding one half of an entangled photon pair on board until the Austrian ground station appears within view of the satellite.<br />\nPan baby also plans to teleport a quantum state\u2014a technique for transferring quantum-encoded information without moving an actual object\u2014from a third Tibetan observatory to the satellite.<br />\n<br />\nMY ELDER SONs CODING PARTNER IS A CHINK--HE SAYS IS VERY INTELLIGENT<br />\n<br />\nEuropean and U.S. teams are also proposing putting quantum instruments on the International Space Station. One goal is to test whether entanglement is affected by a changing gravitational field, by comparing a photon that stays in the weaker gravitational environment of orbit with an entangled partner sent to Earth.<br />\n<br />\nThere are not many experiments which test links between gravity and quantum physics.<br />\n<br />\nThe implications go beyond record-setting demonstrations: A network of satellites will soon connect the quantum computers being designed in labs worldwide.<br />\n<br />\nAgain --quantum entanglement, one of the odder aspects of quantum theory, links the properties of particles even when they are separated by large distances. When a property of one of a pair of entangled particles is measured, the other \"immediately\" settles down into a state compatible with that measurement.<br />\n<br />\nSo how fast is \"immediately\"?<br />\n<br />\nAccording to research by Prof. Juan Yin and colleagues at the University of Science and Technology of China in Shanghai, the lower limit to the speed associated with entanglement dynamics \u2013 or \"spooky action at a distance\" \u2013 is at least 10,000 times faster than light.<br />\n<br />\nVedas says INSTANTANEOUSLY<br />\n<br />\nNiels Bohr, one of the prime developers of quantum theory, once said that those who are not shocked when they first encounter quantum theory cannot possibly have understood it. Eighty years later, this is still true, and applies even to those of us who first encountered quantum theory decades ago.<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS SAYS THAT DARK MATTER ( KALI ) HAS SPEED TOO.<br />\n<br />\nDark matter is a constant sea of matter traveling the opposite direction in the timeline, only appearing for a moment, travelling beyond light-speed, exerting gravity.<br />\n<br />\nGravity is the result of an amount of matter pulling itself together, to create compressive force toward the center, which curves all energy paths both directions in the 4th dimension The closer to center-of-gravity, the faster energy moves, hence the inward pull of gravity. The gravity \u201cfield\u201d is the area where spacetime tries to even itself out.<br />\n<br />\nLIGHT FROM QUASARS ( SARASWATI ) IS FASTER THAN LIGHT .<br />\n<br />\nCUNT Isaac Newtons \"isolated systems \" are NOT found in nature. He did NOT understand what he presented to the world as 99% of his work , including calculus was stolen from 6000 year old Vedic era books.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
